description:
Take to the trails, near and far. These ankle-length hiking pants have a DWR finish to keep you covered against the elements. Articulated knees and stretchy material provide unrestricted movement when you're leaping across streams or chimneying up the final bit of your scramble.

  • Stretchy EcoActive recycled polyester with FlashDry-XD™ wicking treatment is soft against your skin
  • Fabric provides UPF 40+ sun protection
  • Elastic waistband with built-in belt
  • Plenty of zippered pockets keep your belongings secure
  • DWR finish for superior waterproofness and breathability
  • Adjustable ankle opening with a drawcord
name: The North Face Bridgeway Ankle Pants - Women's
